Title: Requires the secretary of state to be an elected position
Summary: Requires the secretary of state to be an elected position.
LawCode: Amd Art 5 §§1 & 4, Art 4 §5, add Art 5 §5, Constn
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to sections 1 and 4 of article 5 and section 5 of article 4, in relation to the election and duties of the secretary of state
